bitmusic.music.business

Class SongSearcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • bitmusic.music.business.SongSearcher

  • public class SongSearcher
extends java.lang.Object
    Class implementing the search feature of our application. The user can search for songs from a specific user

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SongSearcher(SongLibrary songLib)
      library of local user's songs.

    • Method Detail

      • searchSongsbyUser

        public void searchSongsbyUser(java.lang.String userID,
                     java.lang.String SearchID)
        Method invoked when local user wants to get the list of songs owned by userId. Requires a call to the method getSongsByUser of network.api.ApiMusic. Response received directly in the UI
        Parameters:
        userID - id of the user whose songs we are searching for
        SearchID - if of the current search

      • getSongsByUser

        public SongLibrary getSongsByUser(java.lang.String searchId,
                         java.lang.String userId)
        Method invoked when local user is requested his/her songs. Fetches the local SongLibrary, and Local User's categories of contacts.
        Parameters:
        userId - requester's user id
        searchId - search id of the search being done with this method call
        Returns:
        SongLibrary containing only the songs which requester can access

      • searchSongs

        public SongLibrary searchSongs(java.lang.String searchId,
                      java.util.List<java.lang.String> matcherList,
                      SongSearcherStrategy strategy)
        Local user is searching for all songs in LAN with at least one of the tags from tagList. Look up in local library and returns local songs with requested tags, and in all the libraries from connected users via network.
        Parameters:
        searchId -
        matcherList -
        strategy -
        Returns:

      • getLocalSongs

        public SongLibrary getLocalSongs(java.lang.String userId,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> matcherList,
                        SongSearcherStrategy strategy)
        Method invoked when local user is requested to send their songs fulfilling the tag criteria
        Parameters:
        matcherList - list of tags that remote user is requesting
        userId - user id of the requester
        strategy -
        Returns:

      • getLightSong

        public Song getLightSong(Song currentSong,
                java.lang.String userId)
        Get a lightSong with the localSong attribute for the user with userId
        Parameters:
        currentSong - The song whose the lightsong will be created
        authorId - The authorId
        Returns:
        A light song with attribute modified for the autorId.
